channel.title: Grand Exchange Not Letting Me Collect
channel.description:
I added the grand exchange to my 525 server. The buying and selling stuff works but when your offer is complete you can't collect the money you sold the item for, OR if you bought something you can't get the item.
Alright. Here are the major details regarding this issue:
Base - CodeUsa 525
Problem - Cannot collect money when item is sold and cannot collect item when it is bought.
Pictures just incase :
Clicking on the money does not collect it or do anything. [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2d6lgtz.png[/img]
Same with the Dragon Arrows. [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/w8lu1u.png[/img]

item.title: Grand Exchange Not Letting Me Collect
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:7, topic:528668”]how the hell are pictures going to help us?

you “added” it. post what the fuck you added[/quote]

http://www.google.com/forums/showthread.php?18638-562-Adding-Grand-Exchange-Base

replace “google” with r u n e l o c u s

I used this and converted it to work for my base.

Read full topic

@Vain1 wrote:

“I added the grand exchange to my 525 server. The buying and selling stuff works but when your offer is complete you can’t collect the money you sold the item for, OR if you bought something you can’t get the item.”

how do you not know how something works, if you added it?
please, when requesting help, post more information on the base used, links to the tutorial or guide followed, as well as any other information such as code snippets.

Read full topic
